title: Corel WordPerfect Office 2020 Standard | Word Processor, Spreadsheets, Presentations | Newsletters, Labels, Envelopes, Reports, Fillable PDF Forms, eBooks [PC Disc] [Old Version]
description: WordPerfect Office 2020 Standard celebrates the latest version of the office suite supporting your productivity needs-from crafting documents and presentations, to impressive spreadsheet creation and more! You will continue to find all of the familiar features you need to work more efficiently when you tap into built-in PDF functionality, enhanced Reveal Codes, and eBook publishing. Collaboration is key and simple to leverage with support for more than 60 file types, including the latest Microsoft Office formats. It is loyal users like you that helped us identify important workflow enhancements, making it even simpler and more intuitive to discover the tools you need to surpass expectations.
